alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:36PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 336 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Red Wall, or 33 miles south of Kaycee, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Wall around 345 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hole In The Wall and Kaycee. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 228 and 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations
